price: Se les presentó Moisés con milagros evidentes, pero adoraron el becerro [de oro] obrando injustamente.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَكُم مُّوسَىٰ بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمُ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ وَأَنتُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jāakum mūsā bil-bayināti thumma ittakhadhtumu al-ʿij'la min baʿdihi wa-antum ẓālimūna
